item.description:
HOST: Claire P

cell # 603-247-0897

RAIN CANCELS MINI GOLF. In the event that it rains, I will only do the dinner event. Let’s plan on going to dinner at 7:00, should it be raining.

How about a game of mini golf then dinner at the Olive Garden Restaurant in Tyngsboro? I will be going to Max’s Country Golf in Tyngsboro MA and hope that some of you will join me since it’s always so much more fun when we do things as a group.

I would like to play at around 5:00 pm, then head out to dinner afterwards. Approximately 7:00 pm.

Please see the links for information on the venues.

Golf link:

http://www.maxsgolf.com/

Restaurant link:

http://www.olivegarden.com/italian-restaurant/MA/Tyngsboro/1639/

 

 

Location to meet for mini golf is: 383 Middlesex Road Tyngsboro, MA 01879

Location to meet for dinner is: 422 Middlesex Road Tyngsboro MA 01879

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Mini Golf and Dinner in Tyngsboro MA
